Puns.1: I'm a big fan of whiteboards. I find them quite re-markable.
Puns.2: Thanks for explaining the word “many” to me, it means a lot
Puns.3: I got some shoes from my drug dealer recently, I don’t know what he laced them with, but I’ve been tripping all day
Puns.4: What kind of concert only costs 45 cents? A 50 Cent concert featuring Nickelback
Puns.5: Shout out to the people that don’t know what the opposite of in is!
Puns.6: What did the grape say when it got crushed? Nothing, it just let out a little wine
Puns.7: I want to be cremated as it is my last hope for a smoking hot body
Puns.8: So what if I don’t know what apocalypse means?? It’s not the end of the world!
Puns.9: To the guy who invented zero, thanks for nothing
Puns.10: I saw a sign that said falling rocks, so I tried and it doesn’t.
Puns.11: Geology rocks, but Geography is where it’s at!
Puns.12: Did you hear about the restaurant on the moon? I heard the food was good but it had no atmosphere
Puns.13: Can February March? No, but April May
Puns.14: Why was Dumbo sad? He felt irrelephant
Puns.15: My grandpa has the heart of the lion and a lifetime ban from the zoo
Puns.16: I’m close friends with 25 letters of the alphabet, I don’t know y
Puns.17: Yesterday I accidentally swallowed some food coloring. The doctor says I’m okay, but I feel like I’ve dyed a little inside
Puns.18: Sleeping comes so naturally to me, I could do it with my eyes closed
Puns.19: Becoming a vegetarian is one big missed steak.
Puns.20: Rick Astley will let you borrow any of his Pixar collection DVDs but he will never give you Up
Puns.21: Light travels faster than sound. That's why some people appear bright until you hear them speak
Puns.22: I was wondering why the ball was getting bigger. Then it hit me
Puns.23: Why did the Italian chef off himself? Because he lost his l'huile d'olive
Puns.24: How many eggs does it take to make an omlette? One is un oeuf
Puns.25: I Renamed my iPod The Titanic, so when I plug it in, it says “The Titanic is syncing.”
Puns.26: It's hard to explain puns to kleptomaniacs because they always take things literally
Puns.27:: Did you hear about the guy whose whole left side was cut off? He’s all right now
Puns.28: I can’t believe I got fired from the calendar factory. All I did was take a day off
Puns.29: All chemists know that alcohol is always a solution
